participant_1.background:
I had a lot of happy memories playing with my siblings.
I'm happily married to the love of my life.
i start my senior year of high school next week.
My pets are a source of great joy and companionship, and they help me to stay connected to the natural world.
i post on reddit often.

participant_2.background:
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
my wife is legally deaf.
i work in it.
i do not consume caffeine.
I need to learn to be more quiet at night so I don't wake my family.

content.text: Hello, how's your day going?
Hello, it's going well so far!
That's good to hear! I'm starting my senior year of high school next week and I'm pretty excited about it.
That's awesome! What are you looking forward to most?
I'm excited to take some new classes and meet new people. I'm also looking forward to playing sports again.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time outdoors, especially hiking and camping. I also enjoy reading and writing.
That's great! I love reading too. I'm currently reading a book about the history of the United States.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never been much of a history buff, but I could see how that would be a fun read.
It is! I'm really enjoying it so far.
I'm glad to hear that.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm an IT specialist. I work with computers and networks.
Oh, that sounds like a cool job.
It is! I get to help people with their technology problems and make their lives easier.
That's great! I'm sure you're good at it.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies and interests.
Thanks! I try to keep busy.
That's good! I'm sure you have a lot of fun.
Yeah, I do
